mehi thawath mulika karyayak wiya yuddha kalaya thula athurun wuwan sambandhawa kriya kirimayi.lekhakayata mema lipiya sadaha nimiththa sapayuwe api shrilankikayo nam sanwidhanayak wisin pawathwana lada udghoshanayaka chayarupayaki.kuda demala dariyak athurudan wu thama piya soya dena lesa mahinda mama (garu janapathithuma) gen illamin postarayak osawagewa sitiyaya.samahara wata ayage piya rajayata erehi satane di miya yannata atha.yam awasanawantha hethuwakata ho nathinam koti sanwidhanaye bala kirima nisa ho samahara wita swa kamaththenma ho ohu rajya wirodhiyeku wuwa wannata piliwana.namuth ee siyalla dan awasanya.ratata drohiyeku wuwata ayata ohu age aadaraniya piyamaya.apage prayayan gen wen wimedi apa samata danena wedanawa ayata da dane.ayata pamanak nowa thama gnyathin soya dennayi illana thawath dahas gananaka janathawata ema wedanawa danenawa atha.enisa paschath yudha meheyume pramukha karyayak wiya yuthuthe mema janathawata sahana salasimayi.athurudan janathawa athadanguwe sitinam owun hamuwimata gnyathin ta awasthawa labadima da miya gos athi aya pilibada wa soya bala owun wenuwen marana sahathika labadi wandi mudalak pirinami da kala yuthuwa atha.nathi nam thawath kalakata pasu rajayata wiruddhawa awi athata ganne mekuda daruwan wiyahaka.

oonama rajyathanthrikayakuta wiyana sammuthiyehi sandahan paridi nithimaya washayen mukthiyak himiwa thibena athara ee anuwa ohuta ho ayata erehiwa nithimaya washayen kriyathmaka wiya nohaki bawa widesha katayuthu amathyanshaye athireka lekam rodni perera mahatha "dinamina" ta pawasiya.indiyawe shri lanka mahakomasaris prasad kariyawasam mahatha rajyathanthrikayaku washayen piligatha nohaki bawa saha wiyana sammuthiye sandahan rajyathanthrikayakuta himi balathala ikmawa katayuthu karana bawata chodana karamin madurasi mahadhikaranaya wetha pethsamak idiripath kara thibe.thirunaweli disthrikkaye yathumathi prakashana aayathanaye pradhani lina kumar namaththaku wisin mema pethsama idiripathkara athayi thanapathi aaranchi marga sandahan karayi.kese wuwada prasad kariyawasam mahatha janathawa kupitha karawana aakaraye prakasha nikuthkara athi bawa saha ee anuwa ohu jathyanthara sabandatha pilibanda wiyana sammuthiya kadakara athi bawada pethsame sandahan kara thibe.me sambandhayen rodni perera mahatha sandahan kale prasad kariyawasam mahathata erehiwa kriyamarga gatha nohaki bawayi.mita perada awastha kihipayaka di rajyathanthrika washayen shri lankawata erehiwa adhikarana kriyamarga ganimata indiyawe athamun uthsaha kalada awasanaye ee siyalla wyartha wi giya bawada ee mahatha sihipath kaleya.shri lankawa niyojanaya karamin indiyawe rajyathanthrika sewaye niratha prasad kariyawasam mahatha merata kirthimath rajyathanthrikayaku wana athara ee mahatha palapurudu saha athdakim athin bahula pudgalayaku bawada widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya pawasayi. .
